channel.title: {SQL} Intergration Help
channel.description: I have gotten it to read admins and banned users from SQL, but now does somone have a code that checks the database for character files?

item.title: {SQL} Intergration Help
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

public static boolean isRegistered(client clientToSave) {
try {
ResultSet results = query("SELECT * FROM players WHERE playerName = '"+clientToSave.playerName+"';");
while(results.next()) { 
clientToSave.RegisterTest = results.getString("playerName"); }
} catch (Exception e) {}
if(clientToSave.RegisterTest.equals(clientToSave.playerName)){
return true;
}else{
return false;
}
}

100% by me.

Read full topic
